main.title: Help & Support
main.description: Find answers to your questions and get assistance

rules.rule1: Exams will consist of 20 multiple choice questions. Each question is worth 5 points.
rules.rule2: Identity verification will be conducted by showing ID card, driver's license, or passport.
rules.rule3: Students arriving after the first 30 minutes will not be admitted to the exam.
rules.rule4: If a student is caught cheating, their raw score will be considered zero.

makeupExamGuide.title: End of Semester Makeup Exams
makeupExamGuide.warningDescription: Students who have applied to their faculties for makeup exams can check their status here. For these students, the grade from the makeup exam will be valid.
makeupExamGuide.applicationConditions: If you have applied to your faculty and your decision is coming, take the exam.
makeupExamGuide.additionalInfo: For those taking two makeup exams, the exam starts at 09:00 with a duration of 240 minutes.
